Title: The Godfather

Genre.Name: Crime
Genre.Description: Crime films focus on the lives of criminals and the criminal world.

Director.Bio: Francis Ford Coppola is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: The Dark Knight
Description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Action films often feature a resourceful hero struggling against incredible odds, which include life-threatening situations, a villain, or a pursuit which usually concludes in victory for the hero.

Title: Whiplash

Director.Name: Damien Chazelle
Director.Bio: Damien Sayre Chazelle is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter. He is best known for his work on critically acclaimed films such as 'Whiplash,' 'La La Land,' and 'First Man.' Chazelle's innovative storytelling and directorial style have earned him numerous accolades, including an Academy Award for Best Director for 'La La Land,' making him the youngest person to win the award. His films are celebrated for their intense character studies, musical elements, and emotional depth.

Title: La La Land
Description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

Genre.Name: Romance
Genre.Description: Romance films place their primary focus on the relationship and romantic love between two people.
